title: STAT+: FDA reverses course, agrees to review Moderna’s flu vaccine
description: The FDA reversed course and told Moderna it would review its application for a new flu vaccine, the company announced Wednesday.
content: The FDA reversed course and told Moderna it would review its application for a new flu vaccine, the company announced Wednesday.
